text: log tumase striyon ke vishay mein poochhate hai, kaho, "allaah tumhen unake vishay mein hukm deta hai aur jo aayaten tumako is kitaab mein padhakar sunaee jaatee hai, ve un striyon ke, anaathon ke vishay mein bhee hai, jinake haq tum ada nahin karate. aur chaahate ho ki tum unake saath vivaah kar lo aur kamazor yateem bachchon ke baare mein bhee yahee aadesh hai. aur is vishay mein bhee ki tum anaathon ke vishay mein inasaaf par qaayam raho. jo bhalaee bhee tum karoge to nishchay hee, allaah use bhalee-bhaanti jaanata hoga.
